brief_summary.textblock:
The intervention provides services to children with Serious Emotional Disturbance (SED) who
      are in foster care and to their birth parents to prepare the families for reunification.

detailed_description.textblock:
The intervention provide services to children with Serious Emotional Disturbance (SED) who
      are in foster care and to their birth parents to prepare the families for reunification. The
      evaluation follows a randomized design. The pretest will assess the procedures and
      instruments for collecting data on child, youth, and family functioning. Ultimately, after
      the pretest is complete, the data collected through the evaluation will provide information
      on the extent to which the intervention achieved its goal of improving parenting skills and
      enhancing readiness for reunification among the families who received the services.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Children age 3-16 with severe emotional disturbances

          -  In foster care and their families (parents).

        Exclusion Criteria:

        -

intervention.description: Evidence-based, behavioral parent management training model, Parent Management Training - Oregon Model (PMTO) tailored to address permanency barriers of parents of children with SED.

clinical_study.official_title: Permanency Innovations Initiative- Kansas Intensive Permanency Project

primary_outcome.description: Measured by administering two standardized instruments: 1) the Caregiver Wish List (CWL); and, 2) the Family Interaction Task (FIT).
primary_outcome.time_frame: Pre intervention, post intervention and at 12-months

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.description: Measured by observing the results of a subscale of a standardized instrument, the North Carolina Family Assessment Scale, General and Reunification services (NCFAS-G+R). The subscale is identified as "social/community life."
secondary_outcome.measure: Use of community resources & social supports
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre intervention, post intervention and at 12-months

secondary_outcome.description: Measured by the "readiness for reunification" subscale of the North Carolina Family Assessment Scale, General and Reunification services (NCFAS-G+R).
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre intervention, post intervention and at 12-months

secondary_outcome.description: Measured by the relevant items on the North Carolina Family Assessment Scale, General and Reunification services (NCFAS-G+R).
secondary_outcome.measure: Improve parent mental health & Substance Abuse
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre intervention, post intervention and at 12-months

secondary_outcome.description: Measured with Social Skills Improvement System rating scales (SSIS).

Measured by assessing the child's functioning with the Child and Adolescent Functional Assessment Scale (CAFAS) for school-aged children and the Preschool and Early Childhood Functional Assessment Scale (PECFAS) for preschool-aged children.
Measured using data from Kansas' state administrative database for child welfare as reported to AFCARS/NCANDS.
Measured by using data from Kansas' state administrative database for child welfare as reported to AFCARS/NCANDS.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Measured at 6 and 12 months post entry into foster care

secondary_outcome.description: Measured by using data from Kansas' state administrative database for child welfare as reported to AFCARS/NCANDS.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Measured at 6 and 12 months post entry into foster care

secondary_outcome.description: Measured by using data from Kansas' state administrative database for child welfare as reported to AFCARS/NCANDS.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Measured at 6 and 12 months post entry into foster care

secondary_outcome.description: Measured by administering two standardized instruments: 1) the Caregiver Wish List (CWL); and, 2) the Family Interaction Task (FIT).
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre intervention, post intervention and at 12-months
